mil3.1.4:4.2: “paṇḍito kho ayaṃ bhikkhu paṭibalo mayā saddhiṃ sallapituṃ, bahukāni ca me ṭhānāni pucchitabbāni bhavissanti, yāva apucchitāniyeva tāni ṭhānāni bhavissanti, atha sūriyo atthaṃ gamissati, yannūnāhaṃ sve antepure sallapeyyan”ti.
mil3.1.4:5.2: “tena hi tvaṃ, devamantiya, bhadantassa āroceyyāsi ‘sve antepure raññā saddhiṃ sallāpo bhavissatī’”ti.
mil3.1.4:5.3: Idaṃ vatvā milindo rājā uṭṭhāyāsanā theraṃ nāgasenaṃ āpucchitvā rathaṃ abhirūhitvā “nāgaseno nāgaseno”ti sajjhāyaṃ karonto pakkāmi.
mil3.1.4:6.1: Atha kho devamantiyo āyasmantaṃ nāgasenaṃ etadavoca—
mil3.1.4:6.5: Atha kho tassā rattiyā accayena devamantiyo ca anantakāyo ca maṅkuro ca sabbadinno ca yena milindo rājā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu, upasaṅkamitvā rājānaṃ milindaṃ etadavocuṃ—
mil3.1.4:6.9: “Yattake bhikkhū icchati, tattakehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ āgacchatū”ti.
mil3.1.4:7.4: “yattake bhikkhū icchati, tattakehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ āgacchatū”ti.
mil3.1.4:7.8: “yattake bhikkhū icchati, tattakehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ āgacchatū”ti.
mil3.1.4:7.11: “Sabbo panāyaṃ sakkāro paṭiyādito, ahaṃ bhaṇāmi ‘yattake bhikkhū icchati, tattakehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ āgacchatū’ti.
mil3.1.4:7.12: Ayaṃ bhaṇe sabbadinno aññathā bhaṇati, kiṃ nu mayaṃ nappaṭibalā bhikkhūnaṃ bhojanaṃ dātun”ti?
mil3.1.4:8.1: Atha kho devamantiyo ca anantakāyo ca maṅkuro ca yenāyasmā nāgaseno tenupasaṅkamiṃsu, upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ nāgasenaṃ etadavocuṃ—
mil3.1.4:8.3: ‘yattake bhikkhū icchati, tattakehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ āgacchatū’”ti.
mil3.1.4:8.4: Atha kho āyasmā nāgaseno pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya asītiyā bhikkhusahassehi saddhiṃ sāgalaṃ pāvisi.
mil3.1.4:9.1: Atha kho anantakāyo āyasmantaṃ nāgasenaṃ nissāya gacchanto āyasmantaṃ nāgasenaṃ etadavoca—
mil3.1.4:9.2: “bhante nāgasena, yaṃ panetaṃ brūsi ‘nāgaseno’ti, katamo ettha nāgaseno”ti?
mil3.1.4:9.5: “Yo so, bhante, abbhantare vāto jīvo pavisati ca nikkhamati ca, so ‘nāgaseno’ti maññāmī”ti.
mil3.1.4:9.6: “Yadi paneso vāto nikkhamitvā nappaviseyya, pavisitvā na nikkhameyya, jīveyya nu kho so puriso”ti?
mil3.1.4:9.8: “Ye panime saṅkhadhamakā saṅkhaṃ dhamenti, tesaṃ vāto puna pavisatī”ti?
mil3.1.4:9.10: “Ye panime vaṃsadhamakā vaṃsaṃ dhamenti, tesaṃ vāto puna pavisatī”ti?
mil3.1.4:9.12: “Ye panime siṅgadhamakā siṅgaṃ dhamenti, tesaṃ vāto puna pavisatī”ti?
mil3.1.4:9.15: “Nāhaṃ paṭibalo tayā vādinā saddhiṃ sallapituṃ, sādhu, bhante, atthaṃ jappehī”ti.
mil3.1.4:9.16: “Neso jīvo, assāsapassāsā nāmete kāyasaṅkhārā”ti thero abhidhammakathaṃ kathesi.
